participant_1.background:
I bought my first bike with the money I earned mowing lawns.
I put on my favorite pair of jeans made from recycled plastic bottles.
i love rpg computer games.
i have trained over 20 types of animals.
I want to share my photography with the world.

participant_2.background:
I am most proud of my ability to take care of myself and Gila, even though I grew up without parents.
I love to see my son's face light up when he sees his new toys in his nursery.
I am grateful to my parents for raising me with a good sense of financial responsibility.
I am worried about my future after high school, but my pet koi, Spot, always cheers me up.
i love to laugh.

content.text: Whats the best thing you've ever done in your life?
I'm most proud of my ability to take care of myself and Gila, even though I grew up without parents.
Thanks. I'm also grateful to my parents for raising me with a good sense of financial responsibility, so I'm not too worried about my future after high school.
Oh, that's good to hear. I'm glad you're in a good place.
Thanks. I'm happy with my life right now.
Me too. I love spending time with my family and friends.
I do too. I love to see my son's face light up when he sees his new toys.
That's so cute! I'm glad he's happy.
Thanks. I'm also happy with my pet koi, Spot. He always cheers me up.
Oh, I love koi. They're so beautiful.
Me too. I'm glad I have him.
Me too. I'm glad you're in a good place.
